 Descriptionï¼š2 In 1 Hair Dryer Brush Automatic Rotating Roller Hot Styler

 Hair Styler

 With a powerful combination of a round brush and a hair dryer tool, this can effectively dry and style your hair at once, giving you a voluminous and frizz- in single step.

Multifunctional Hair Styling Brush

 Straighten, dry, curl, style, and add a dramatic volume and to your hair and get long lasting curls without hair products. The oval shaped brush keeps hair from getting tangles and the round edges help add volume to hair.

Safe Ergonomic Design

 Natural soft bristles for ultimate smoothness to frizz and damage.

 Ionic ceramic coating technologies to give regulated temperature and your hair and scalp from hurting.

 Ergonomic handle is designed for maximum comfort and ease of use during styling.

 360Â° swivel cord allows high flexibility to move without the cord tangled or damaged.

Salon--Blow-Dry at Home

 No need for a trip to the salon anymore, saves you a lot of time and money. This can be used for party, work and travel, suitable for men women and whole family. Become a fashionista anytime, anywhere.

PRODUCT SPECIFICATION

Product name: Automatic curling comb

Product size: 318x53x53mm

Color box size: 33.5x9.5x6cm

Material: PC+PPS

Bare metal weight: 385g

Single set weight: 632g

Packing size: 49.5*35*35cm

Packing gross weight: 13.2kg Packing number: 20pcs

Voltage: AC 100-240V Power: 40W

Current: 0.35A Speed: 40rpm

Gear position: three gears (180â„ƒ 200â„ƒ 230â„ƒ)

Function: three-speed temperature control + left and right rotation + alarm prompt

Certification: 3C ROHS

Color: black red

Memory function: Stop in that gear when shutting down, and to the gear when shutting down when restarting.

Heating time: 180Â°C for about 110 seconds. About 220 seconds at 200Â°C. 230Â°C for about 350 seconds

Package Inclusion/s: Get 1 x Automatic 360 Hair Curler

Package Inclusion/s: Get 1 x Automatic 360 Hair Curler * Auto Rotation: The rotation mechanism of the hair dryer brush support to rotate in 2 directions, you can easily use this hot air brush with one hand,and the other hand to help section.
 * 2 Different Size Brushes: This Hot Air Styler comes with 2 interchangeable spin brushes(1.5"& 2") for different lengths of hair.
 * 4-in-1 Hair Dryer Brush: Hairdryer, straightener, curling iron, and comb all in one for styling and drying hair in one step.The design allows for smooth, easy styling with minimal effort.
 * Ceramic & Ionic Technology: Features the ceramic coating barrel to help reduce damage from over-styling with even heat distribution.Negative ions can penetrate the hair to less frizz and more shine.
 * 3 Heat/Speed Settings: Equipped with 3 heat/speed settings with cooling option settings. 360Â° airflow provides the right heat, compared to hair dryers and curlers, this heat will be more gentle, cause less damage and create natural hair.
